body: I really love this server like we all do but I have to leave for about two weeks because of exams. Im not leaving because I never will; it is simply; I will have no time for Games and MC distracts me from work. So yeah I'll be on TS next friday but until then Cya guys! I will be working on the AviPost though because Me and Awesome_Apricot have a release date.. :3 Just some feedback that would be cool to see come two weeks would be a few more Nexus maps!

title: Im going to be gone a while.....

You better put your articles on that google doc >_< it's all there for you ;D
nah, DW mate we've loads of time XD
have a blood break man
